title: Any words on Slayer Pantheon skin
body:
And does anyone knows when its going to be available?

That's the only skin i really care about.

I tried to contact RIOT and ask them about it,because that skin is the only wish of my son who got recently released form the hospital,but answer was 'we had it on sale lat year in November...Some answer that was...I really couldn't care less about sale that took place 9 months ago.
